text: Soni pamasile paŵajigele Allah chilanga cha ŵanache ŵa Israila, ni twatomeche mwa ŵanganyao achinnongola likumi kwisa ŵaŵili, sano Allah ni jwatite: “Chisimu Une ndinamwe, naga nchiimikaga Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka ni kwakulupililaga achimitenga Ŵangu, ni kwakamuchisyaga, ni kunkongosyaga Allah ngongole jambone, chisimu chene tinansiimachisye yakusakala yenu, soni tinjin'jinjisya kwene ku Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, nambo jwachakane panyuma pa chele (chilangachi) mwa jenumanja, nikuti amasile mwasokonechele (kuleka) litala lyagoloka.”
